mapper.insert: insert into eden_user (user_id, user_pw, user_nickname, user_gender, user_birth, user_phone, user_email, user_status, user_join_date, user_last_connection_date) values ( #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_gender}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, 'active', NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM eden_user where user_id = #{user_id}
select count(*) from eden_user where user_nickname = #{user_nickname}
select count(*) from eden_user where user_phone = #{user_phone}
select count(*) from eden_user where user_email = #{user_email}
